name: Lee Charles BROADWATER, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
docket_number: Appeal No. 40 Middle District Appeal Docket 1992

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: Lee Charles BROADWATER, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Arthur R. Thomas, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
619 A.2d 1356
Lee Charles BROADWATER, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Dec. 7, 1992.
Decided Feb. 22, 1993.
Reconsideration Denied Aug. 23, 1993.
Lee Charles Broadwater, pro se.
Arthur R. Thomas, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
